backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor types for products, retailers, listings, orders, applications, and related domain structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying files, components, and tests related to fully reverting the project to Version 34.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, components, pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark mode with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that wraps the router with theme, error boundary, cart provider, and global Toaster UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: Admin card enabling full system wipe with confirmation dialog, success state, and logout‑and‑reload flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/ListingEdi: Dialog for creating or editing listings with product, retailer, price, stock, and promo configuration fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or updating products, handling fields, image upload, categories, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog for creating or editing retailers, managing contact info, address, hours, and submitting retailer data.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor for weekly and holiday opening hours, providing controls to toggle days, set times, and manage overrides.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Reusable searchable dropdown select component using popover and command UI elements.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Empty placeholder file for admin bootstrap logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Displays an alert stating admin features are unavailable due to missing backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Shows a blocking loading overlay during authentication or initial actor setup for the current identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing query state on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog that collects and submits user profile information with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks admin status and either renders children or shows an access‑denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Checks if the user is approved or an admin; if not, shows an approval request UI before granting access.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and prompts the user to log in when no identity is detected.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Displays an image with fallback logo or hero placeholders when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Global React error boundary capturing runtime and promise errors and showing a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: Renders an error screen with details and actions to reload or return home.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Cart context managing items with add, remove, update, persistence, and total calculations.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, category filtering, sorting, and derived product lists for catalog items.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Empty file placeholder for catalogue preview section.
Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year.
Header with navigation, cart badge, login button, mobile menu, and brand image.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Empty file placeholder for the shop landing hero section.
Main shop layout with header, footer, and dialogs for auth initialization, town setup, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/towns/DefaultTow: Dialog prompting users to select and save a default town with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Provides admin hooks for listing all orders and updating order statuses with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Fetches the global product catalogue from the backend via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Lists categories by merging backend and predefined lists and provides mutation for creating new categories.
Fetches or submits a driver's application and manages related query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureDefaultTownO: Placeholder hook meant to auto-assign a default town but currently disabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Provides listing queries and mutations including create, update, delete, and retailer/product filtered listings.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Manages customer orders, including listing, fetching, and creating orders with delivery and payment handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePickupPointApplica: Manages pickup point application retrieval, status, and submission with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating products with cache invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements approval-related queries and mutations, including checking caller approval and managing user approvals and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailerPortal.ts: Adds hooks for fetching the current retailer, their inventory, and their orders from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Defines hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting retailers with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleApplications.t: Contains hooks to manage shopper, pickup point, and driver role applications with approval and rejection mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopperApplication: Provides hooks for managing the caller’s personal shopper application, status, and submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Adds a system wipe mutation placeholder that clears query cache but is not yet implemented in the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useTownMembership.ts: Defines hooks for town membership queries and mutations, currently disabled pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Provides placeholder hooks for town listing and management, all disabled until backend methods are implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Offers hooks to get and save user profiles, including caller profile and arbitrary user profiles for admins.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with custom colors and a utility container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Admin interface to review, approve, reject, and view details of driver applications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Admin page for listing management, including searching, editing, creating, and deleting product-retailer listings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin dashboard for viewing all orders, filtering by status, and updating order states including assignments.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Admin interface for reviewing, approving, and rejecting pickup point applications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page supporting search, creation, and editing of global catalogue products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting retailers using dialogs and API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: System settings page showing placeholder general settings and a danger zone wipe-system action.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Admin interface to review, approve, reject, and view details of personal shopper applications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTownApplic: Static page explaining town applications are no longer required and showing related info.
Management page for creating, editing, filtering, and removing towns with form handling and tabs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Admin dashboard linking to management pages for shoppers, drivers, pickup points, retailers, and products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page for viewing items, adjusting quantities, removing items, and checking out summary totals.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Displays a searchable product catalogue, filters items, and allows adding orderable listings to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order checkout including delivery method, payment selection, validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverApplicatio: Provides a form for drivers to submit applications with selfie upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Empty placeholder page for the driver dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Shows role options and navigation for applying as driver, shopper, or pickup point, plus application status.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Empty placeholder page for master admin role applications.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Lists customer orders with status badges, loading states, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyTownsPage.tsx: Allows users to view, add, and remove favorite towns with validation and town selection.
Displays detailed order information, including status, delivery method, payment method, and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/PickupPointAppli: Provides a form for users to submit pickup point applications with image upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Empty file placeholder for a product detail page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Landing-style page introducing the platform with hero content and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Empty file placeholder for requesting new products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Empty file placeholder for a retailer product catalog.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerDashboar: Retailer dashboard showing retailer info, inventory stats, and listing statuses with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Empty file placeholder for a retailer list page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerOrderTra: Displays orders associated with a retailer, including status badges and a table view with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Displays the user's shopper, pickup point, and driver application statuses with badges and messages.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperApplicati: Form for submitting a shopper application, including selfie upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Empty placeholder page for a future shopper dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Empty placeholder page for listing towns or suburbs.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Defines all hash-based routes for the shop, admin, and application pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Safely extracts a direct URL from an ExternalBlob, returning an empty string on failure.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Provides file-to-bytes conversion and basic image file validation by type and size.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and validating ZAR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Helpers for selecting primary product images, listing up to three images, and generating safe image URLs.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds deployment-safe URLs for public assets using Vite's base URL.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a constant list of South African provinces and its type.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Defines theme asset URLs for the app’s logo and hero image using publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats IC nanosecond timestamps into readable date or date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and cleaning URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, custom themes, typography, container queries, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for current development planning.
